trends: There have been 16 other sightings in Shreveport
There were no other sightings in Shreveport on or around September 20th 2009
divs: Sighting DetailsI was at my cousins house when i looked up to see if i could see another ufo similar to the 1 i saw on the 2nd of sept. It was a bright color alternating ufo changing color between orange and blueish color. It also would shape shift from 3 small orbs to 1 solid orb. Its almost becoming routine it seems for me to see these objects flying around in the sky.
